          </inlinemediaobject> on the <emphasis role="bold">Toolbar</emphasis> to open the <guilabel>Settings</guilabel> form.</para>
{docbook}

*2.* Change settings for the *Mail* application in 4 tabs: General, Return Receipts, Layout and Delegation.

{docbook}
<para>
          <emphasis role="bold">i.</emphasis> In the <guilabel>General</guilabel> tab, change basic information.</para>
{docbook}

!images/settings.png|align="center" width="120mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!

*Details:*
{docbook}
<informaltable>
          <tgroup cols="2">
            <thead>
              <row>
                <entry>Field</entry>
                <entry>Description</entry>
              </row>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Select a Default Account</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry>Set the default account if you use multiple accounts.</entry>
              </row>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Number of conversations per page</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry>Select the number of conversations which will be displayed per page from the list: 10, 20, 30, or 70 messages.</entry>
              </row>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Automatically check messages every</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry>Select the time interval to automatically check the system, including 6 available options: Never, 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 20 minutes, 30 minutes and 1 hour.</entry>
              </row>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Compose message with</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry>Select the editor type for composing messages, including <emphasis role="bold">Rich Text</emphasis> and <emphasis role="bold">Plain Text</emphasis>.</entry>
              </row>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Reply to message with</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                  <para> Select the message type to reply, including <informalexample>
                      <informalexample/>
                    </informalexample> -  <guilabel>Original message as attachment:</guilabel> Reply to messages with attachments. <informalexample>
                      <informalexample/>
                    </informalexample> - <guilabel>Original message text quoted:</guilabel> Reply to messages with text only.</para>
                </entry>
              </row>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Forward message with</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry>
                  <para> Select the message type to reply, including <informalexample>
                      <informalexample/>
                    </informalexample> - <guilabel>Original message as attachment:</guilabel> Forward messages with attachment. <informalexample>
                      <informalexample/>
                    </informalexample> - <guilabel>Original message text quoted:</guilabel> Forward messages with text only.</para>
                </entry>
              </row>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Save sent messages in the 'Sent' folder</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry> Tick this checkbox to save sent messages in the 'Sent' folder.</entry>
              </row>
            </tbody>
          </tgroup>
        </informaltable>
{docbook}

{docbook}
<para>
          <emphasis role="bold">ii.</emphasis> In the <guilabel>Return Receipts</guilabel> tab, set options to specify what the <emphasis role="bold">Mail</emphasis> application should do when it gets a "<link linkend="Change_message_preferences">Return Receipt</link>" request. It means that you can determine whether to send a notification of having read the message to the sender or not. <anchor id="Return_Receipts_settings"/>
        </para>
{docbook}

!images/Mail_return_receipts.png|align="center" width="120mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!

*Details:*
{docbook}
<informaltable>
          <tgroup cols="2">
            <thead>
              <row>
                <entry>Field</entry>
                <entry>Description</entry>
              </row>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Ask me when someone requests a return receipt</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry>If you receive a message with the <emphasis role="bold">Return Receipt</emphasis> request, the <emphasis role="bold">Mail</emphasis> application will show a pop-up message for you to decide sending a notification of having read the message to the sender or not.</entry>
              </row>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Never send a return receipt</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry> The <emphasis role="bold">Mail</emphasis> application will ignore all <emphasis role="bold">Return Receipt</emphasis> requests from senders.</entry>
              </row>
              <row>
                <entry>
                  <guilabel>Always send a return receipt</guilabel>
                </entry>
                <entry> If you receive a message with the <emphasis role="bold">Return Receipt</emphasis> request, the <emphasis role="bold">Mail</emphasis> application will automatically send a notification of having read the message to the sender without asking for your permission.</entry>
              </row>
            </tbody>
          </tgroup>
        </informaltable>
{docbook}
{docbook}
<para>
          <emphasis role="bold">iii.</emphasis> In the <guilabel>Layout</guilabel> tab, personalize the <guilabel>Mail</guilabel> layout by ticking another checkbox corresponding to your desired layout. The <guilabel>Horizontal Split</guilabel> type is set by default.</para>
{docbook}

!images/settings2.png|align="center" width="120mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!
{docbook}
<para>
          <emphasis role="bold">iv.</emphasis> In the <guilabel>Delegation</guilabel> tab, delegate your account to any registered user in the system as follows:</para>
{docbook}

!images/Mail_delegation.png|align="center" width="120mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!

{docbook}
<itemizedlist>
          <listitem>
            <para>Select the account you want to delegate from the <guilabel>This account</guilabel> list by clicking <inlinemediaobject>
                <imageobject role="fo">
                  <imagedata fileref="images/down_arrow_icon1.png" format="PNG" scalefit="1" width="4mm"/>
                </imageobject>
                <imageobject role="html">
                  <imagedata fileref="images/down_arrow_icon1.png" format="PNG" scalefit="0" width="4mm"/>
                </imageobject>
              </inlinemediaobject>.</para>
          </listitem>
          <listitem>
            <para>Enter the name of user to whom you want to delegate your selected account in the <guilabel>will be delegated to</guilabel> field.</para>
          </listitem>
          <listitem>
            <para>Tick the <guilabel>Full</guilabel> checkbox next to <inlinemediaobject>
                <imageobject role="fo">
                  <imagedata fileref="images/Add_delegated_user.png" format="PNG" scalefit="1" width="4mm"/>
                </imageobject>
                <imageobject role="html">
                  <imagedata fileref="images/Add_delegated_user.png" format="PNG" scalefit="0" width="4mm"/>
                </imageobject>
              </inlinemediaobject> if you want to assign all permissions, which can be done on your selected account, to the delegated user. If this checkbox is not selected, the user can only view mails of the delegated account.</para>
          </listitem>
          <listitem>
            <para>Click <inlinemediaobject>
                <imageobject role="fo">
                  <imagedata fileref="images/Add_delegated_user.png" format="PNG" scalefit="1" width="4mm"/>
                </imageobject>
                <imageobject role="html">
                  <imagedata fileref="images/Add_delegated_user.png" format="PNG" scalefit="0" width="4mm"/>
                </imageobject>
              </inlinemediaobject> to accept adding your delegated user. The delegated user will be updated in the Accounts table. In this table, you can revoke the <emphasis role="bold">Full</emphasis> permission or add the <emphasis role="bold">Full</emphasis> permission to your delegated accounts by unticking or ticking the relevant checkbox respectively in the <guilabel>Full</guilabel> column of the Accounts table.</para>
          </listitem>
</itemizedlist>

<para>
<emphasis role="bold">3.</emphasis> Click <guibutton>Save</guibutton> to accept your changes.</para>
